mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM zhenghe_departments a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zhenghe_departments( id, avatar, departments_name, s_departments_id, description, create_date, type, standby1, standby2, delete_mark, remark, update_date, mender, creator ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{avatar}, #{departmentsName}, #{sDepartmentsId}, #{description}, #{createDate}, #{type}, #{standby1}, #{standby2}, #{deleteMark}, #{remark}, #{updateDate}, #{mender}, #{creator} )
mapper.update: UPDATE zhenghe_departments SET avatar = #{avatar}, departments_name = #{departmentsName}, s_departments_id = #{sDepartmentsId}, description = #{description}, type = #{type}, remark = #{remark} WHERE id = #{id}
